entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate ARM64 CFG failures when using the dispatcher #65111
  • Consider changing the nullability for generic MemoryCache.Set methods #65107
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Incorrect result computed with forward sub #65104
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails on Server 2022 #65098
  • Improve File.Move performance #65092
    Future
  • [tools] AndroidAppBuilder dx dependence breaks on Android SDK 31.0.0 and up #65087
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort in NET 6 randomly scrambles the byte order of an input stream #65080
  • JIT: Control-flow guard checked calls should preference call target to validator-preserved register #65077
  • JIT: Control-flow guard checked interface calls should not materialize cell addresses twice #65076
  • [API Proposal]: FractionalPart property for the decimal datatype #65074
  • JIT: Optimize "X ^ 0" to "X" #65071
  • ImmutableArray RemoveRange methods are currently O(M*N) #65069
    Future
  • A given header is not correctly updated when added while calling AddHttpClient #65094
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest Failures #65065
  • Blazor PWA WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory #65066
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluation of functions returning char #65064
    7.0.0
  • System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncoderUnitTests.BasicEncoding failing on Windows.Amd64.Server2022 #65056
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Sync.HandleCollectionsAsync failing in Windows.Amd64.Server2022 #65053
  • .NET Native compiler crashing #65052
  • Debugger deadlock: Controller lock taken under R2R info loading results in suspension deadlock #65047
    Future
  • Test failure System.Threading.Tests.PeriodicTimerTests.PeriodicTimer_ActiveOperations_TimerRooted #65043
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RenamedEventArgsTests.RenamedEventArgs_ctor_OldFullPath_DirectoryIsRelativePathFromCurrentDirectoryInGivenDrive #65042
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse42\\Crc32_ro\\Crc32_ro.cmd #65040

Closed

  • Possible issue with guard pages on Windows ARM64 #65058
  • Code optimization: BitConverter.GetBytes #65106
  • What happened with the Common Type System? #65073
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #64956
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timing out #64943
  • .NET SDK new "Logging analyzers" report dozens of new errors in build with Visual Studio 2022 #65085
  • SslStream delayed client certificate with TLS 1.3 on Linux #55757
    7.0.0
  • HostBuilder.CreateServiceProvider() on release 6.0 generates System.ArgumentNullException #64293
  • [release/6.0] ILVerify does not build in source-build #64817
  • .NET 6.0 C# DeflateStream.Read fails to read correctly over 8192 bytes #65081
  • HttpStress fails to build on Linux, msquic package seems to be outdated #64902
  • Publishing Blazor WASM with AOT enabled failed at "emcc --version" #64854
  • WasmTestOnNodeJs-System.Threading.Channels.Tests failing with 'RuntimeError: invalid index into function table' #65016
  • consolidate _handshakeBuffer and _internalBuffer inside SslStream #52037
    7.0.0
  • NodeJS packed as correlation payload doesn't preserve symbolic links #64473
  • Implement `ToString()` on `System.Collections.DictionaryEntry` #59292
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test #64941
  • Stream from System.IO.Compression.ZipFileArchive.Open doesn't return more than 8kb or so per Read() call #65037
  • Add runtime-full pipeline to replace CI/non-CI split #61588
  • jitstress test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh throws an exception #64587
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • disable TotalMemory2 test from gcstress runs #65110
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Second round of changing null checks to !! #65108
    area-Meta
  • Don't throw from RemoteExecutor on SkipTestExceptions #65105
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Relax address exposure check for tailcalls #65102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use emsdk from container #65100
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] stabilize QUIC tests on server 2022 #65097
    area-System.Net
  • Fixing a runtime check and test to match the EnableISA flag behavior #65096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Removing Unity and StructureMap from DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests #65091
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add xargs for dotnet format command #65090
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Add arm64 SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 Abs #65086
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • One-shot decrypt directly in to destination with padding #65084
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Disable System.Threading.Channels.Tests #65083
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Disable ILVerify for source build #65082
    area-ILVerification
  • Fix bool.TryParse/Format on big-endian systems #65078
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest #65075
    area-System.Net
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • [release/6.0] Improve SSL platform detection (#64923) #65054
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • JIT: verify containment safety before forming address modes #65048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65046
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Remove the concept of fat dispatch tokens and fat type ids from 64 bit platforms #65045
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Get rid of fallback to process ids enumeration in ProcessManager.IsProcessRunning (Windows) #65041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Port ICU tests fix for server core x86 #65039
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/6.0] Port ICU tests fix for server core x86 #65038
    area-System.Globalization
  • Mark cctor tests with RequiresProcessIsolation property #65036
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Deduplicate several special classes of JIT/Methodical tests #64842
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Clean up several special tests under JIT/Methodical #64837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • For LclHeap touch a page at [originalSp] not at [originalSp+amount] #65088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Arm64 CFG dispatcher being always disabled #65095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce DOTNET_AltJitOS #64979
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Limit number of JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/* under GCStress #65049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Account for HWI stores in LIR side effects code #65079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • stabilize QUIC tests on server 2022 #65057
    test bug, area-System.Net.Quic
  • fix ping tests on unsupported unix platforms #65060
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging source generator failures with various syntax #64779
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #64717
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • FileSystemWatcher.Unix: use CLOEXEC when initializing an inotify instance. #64971
    area-System.IO, tenet-reliability, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Change `OSX.1015.Arm64.Open` to `OSX.1100.Arm64.Open` #65093
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #64679
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Disable ILVerify for source build #64833
    area-ILVerification
  • Move iOS/tvOS simulator runs back to the OSX.1015.Amd64.Open queue #65070
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Stress fixed docker #65063
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 ConditionalSelect on Arm64 #65062
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Consolidate _handshakeBuffer and _internalBuffer in SslStream #64747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Mono] Add arm64 SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 Ceiling and Floor #64994
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Disable SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBuffer tests on OSX #65055
    area-System.Net
  • Run System.Collections instead of System.Runtime tests #65044
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #64968
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add a new wrapper `runtime-wasm.yml` to be used from azdo #65032
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT Fix error during unwrap existing instance #64996
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Override DictionaryEntry.ToString to match KeyValuePair.ToString #64959
    area-System.Collections, 7.0.0
  • update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65020
    area-System.Net.Http, test enhancement
  • improve SslStream tests on misconfigured systems #64966
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement

Updated

  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 Part I #64961
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fix RegionInfo creation when using LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED LCID #64927
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Print out the ws: address #64838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Unroll String.Equals for constant input [0..16] length #64821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement LoadPairVector64 and LoadPairVector128 #64864
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable set of nullability checks in NativeAOT CoreLib #64730
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Compliance CVE-2021-26701 fix for a test project #64984
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Make System.Math/MathF.Truncate an intrinsic #65014
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Hosting: ConfigDoesReload tests: increase timeout. #64976
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix runtime-official when executed against PRs in azdo #65034
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • ran great, then after relaunch of Rider, "Unable to resolve ..." #1833

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Initial support for IsVirtualVtable calls #1768

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce the use of .Result/.Wait()/.GetResult() in the codebase #23850
  • When upgrading .NET versions(6.x), apps get "stuck" #23857
  • NetFramework 4.6.1 to 4.8 with System.Net.Http regression #23842
  • .NET 6 NETSDK1152 (found multiple publish output files with the same relative path) triggered by project dependencies defined in .sln file. #23839
  • `pdbonly` fails on Arm64 #23838

Closed

  • The user as nt authority is fail to upgrade to 6.0.102 with 17.0.5 pre-installed #23567
    6.0.3xx
  • PRs occasionally failing with no obvious reason #23500
  • dotnet cli doesn't seem to respect profile / launch file / command line arguments #23565
    7.0.1xx
  • Program.cs ProcessArgs ignores telemetryClient #23843

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1603495 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Embed fSharp.Core --- retarget to release/6.0.3xx branch #23856
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update .vsts-ci.yml #23852
    Area-Infrastructure
  • https://www.facebook.com/vidaeverdade/ #23835
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #23832
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 6.0.201 servicing branding #23831
    Area-Infrastructure, Branding

Merged

  • Opt into IEventSource4 #23834
    Area-NetSDK
  • Revert "Embed FSharp.Core.nuget package in dotnet SDK" #23853
  • Enable launch profile arguments with dotnet run #23830
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • make a parallel sdk build env script for powershell, not just batch #23194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Update to 1ES pools #23818
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #23821
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix: dotnet Program.cs: Pass telemetryClient onto the overload #23844
    Area-NetSDK
  • Embed FSharp.Core.nuget package in dotnet SDK #23779
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Definite Assignment in Struct Constructors #5737

PullRequests

Created

  • Update links to the spec documents to point to the ECMA standard draft #5739

Merged

  • Update schedule #5738

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio adds second quotation mark in unappropriate situations #59427
  • Value tracking continues to work after closing solution or even changing solution #59423
    17.2
  • Compiler does not support Windows PDBs on ARM #59421
  • Error format string not filled for Error ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1} #59418
    17.2
  • Error format string not filled for CS20246 when referencing other project with non-compiling method #59417
  • Support "remove duplicate dependency references/packages" #59408
    Backlog
  • Show potential fixes often contains no fixes related to error/warning #59403
    Backlog
  • Source Generators: Timing APIs #59398

Closed

  • "Generate Equals and GetHasCode" Throws Exception #57361
    Backlog
  • IDE0150 incorrectly flags is object check in Expression<Func<T>> where pattern matching is not supported #58377
    17.2.P1
  • Prompt for variable upon ctor snippet #59252
    Backlog
  • CSC : warning AD0001: Analyzer 'MyApp.Analyzers.MyAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.IO.FileNotFoundException' with message 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces, Version=2.9.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified.'. #59367
    17.2
  • Object creation can be simplified suggestion should be more clever #39146
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense suggests name that does not match convention #36248
    Backlog
  • 'view commit details' bug about 'xxx.resx' #59415
  • IDE0055 doesn't work well with IDE0190/csharp_style_prefer_parameter_null_checking #59414
    17.2
  • Wrong refactor #43373
    Backlog
  • Add parameter null check refactoring doesn't work on record primary constructors #58779
    Backlog
  • Introduce API for determining which symbols within a reference were used #59389
  • Syntax highlight breaks down for generic method used as method group for a Delegate param #58538
    Backlog
  • Add null check quick action adds one-liner #58571
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fxi mispeeling #59440
    Area-IDE
  • Move cancellation catch up out of the navigate to searcher #59439
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Do not use implicit object creation on nullable struct types #59438
    Area-IDE
  • Include record primary constructor props in nav-to when not backed by a corresponding field/prop. #59437
    Area-IDE
  • Produce reference assembly in out directory #59435
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce reference assembly in out directory #59434
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 'Add selected parameters to constructor' should respect existing user formatting #59432
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid directly exposing temporary storage streams #59431
    Area-IDE
  • Suppress formatting with implicit object initializers #59430
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • LSP breakpoint placement #59428
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry 16.4.29 #59426
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move option to right category #59425
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Change json detection from a suggestion to a refactoring #59422
    Area-IDE
  • Assert diagnostics pass correct number of arguments #59419
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Fix the titles we show the user for the 'use is null' fixers #59409
    Area-IDE
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up IDocumentProvider #59405
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Update Language Feature Status.md #59433
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't mention minor VS release in contributing doc #59436
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider #59361
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Go To Implementation show metadata results (#59100)" (#59376)" #59402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve 'object/collection initializer can be simplified' #59363
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only consider the best possible naming rule match for a symbol or type kind #59401
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Consolidate classification of tracked item spans #59381
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixup add-using-statement to preserve comments properly in VB. #59353
    Area-IDE, Next
  • TelemetryLogger refactoring and testing #59407
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support for adding null checks to records. #59404
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59412
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59411
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix wrapping of PII value #59396
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Add Razor External Access APIs to allow passing classification options through ExcerptService #59394
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support embedded languages in raw strings. #59348
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Go To Implementation show metadata results" #59376
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Support raw UTF8 String Literals #59390
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typos #59237
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix completion not working for pointer-typed parameters #59143
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Community
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Let Import Completion check for global usings auto-generated by SDK #59360
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use same naming style for modules as classes #47242
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement Initializer expression wrappers #39878
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Introduce local formatting #47510
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #40102
  • Consider using C# 11's required properties as a equivalent to `EditorRequiredAttribute` #40100
  • Consider the impact of C# 11's required properties on model binding / validation #40099
  • In JS interop, add Invoke/InvokeAsync overloads that use C#11 param span #40098
  • InputText and other input components do not use SetUpdatesAttributeName() for two-way binding #40097
    Backlog
  • Cannot wait on monitors on this runtime #40096
  • Razor parser fails to correctly parse escaped @ symbol in title attribute #40094
  • Hot reload using dotnet watch doesn't work 98% of the time #40091
  • Session values not maintained between HttpClient call and normal XHR requests #40089
  • Support `WithApiDescription` extension method for minimal APIs #40084
    7.0-preview3
  • [Migration] Support sharing auth state with "backend" System.Web app #40083

Closed

  • Error when using custom HTTPS certificate from pem file #40020
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Use given model nullability in razor pages #37510
    6.0.2
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #40090
  • Blazor InputText FormatValueAsString behaves in a strange way #40058
  • ASP.NET CORE 6 - Blazor - Infer the component type for child components from a method #39217
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40055
  • More stable response time on .NET 3.1 then .NET 6 #39981
  • Differences between health check execution (.NET 3.1 and 6.0) #39974
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nearly all CS1591 #40106
  • Add the `displayName` Property to Project Template Parameters #40105
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • !trial! Upload packages much less #40103
  • Port https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/pull/38814 to 6.0 #40101
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • able to use Empty AppConfiguration #40095
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Support OpenAPI summaries and descriptions on minimal endpoints #40088
    area-web-frameworks
  • Do not install the JDK in quarantined pipelines #40085
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #40073
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Move CredScanSuppressions.json to root of repo #39780
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Update 5.0/6.0 SiteExtension versions #40077
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #40074
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • Fix Kestrel overpooling of HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 request headers #40087
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyIgnoresItsOwnDirectoryWithRelativePathSegmentWhenCopying #40060
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • Root `-projects` paths in build.sh #40086
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Update README Roadmap, Related Projects for .NET 7 #40076
    7.0-preview2
  • Activate components by default #39997
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • Log IIS BadHttpRequestExceptions at debug level #40002
    area-runtime
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delete overlapping ColorExtension properties from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS #4601
  • [Android] MAUI Blazor app breaks Android 8 launcher #4598
  • [Android emulator] MAUI Blazor essentials camera exception #4597
  • Collect list of changed default padding/margin/spacing values #4594
  • VS 17.1 prv2: default maui builds and deploys Windows but fails to build Android with error shown #4593
  • [Enhancement] Maui Framework should respond to C# Hot Reload events #4592
  • Provide an event on all Controls Views that will indicate when they have become attached/detached from platform window #4590
  • SearchHandler.ItemTemplate can not be fill #4589
  • BlazorWebView AdditionalBrowserArguments #4586
  • Click Package.appxmanifest error #4585
  • Suggest to introduce a new attribute, like XamlAlias, so that long type names can be referenced with its Alias #4581

Closed

  • Review KnownTypeConverters Code #1490
  • [iOS] Convert NavigationRenderer to an implementation IViewHandler #3906
  • [iOS] Convert PhoneFlyoutPageRenderer to an implementation IViewHandler #3907
  • [iOS] Convert TabbedRenderer to an implementation of IViewHandler #3908
  • Exception trying to use a custom Layout #4542
  • RuntimePlatform - obsolete - make it use essentials #3945
  • Idiom/SetIdiom()/SetTargetIdiom() - obsolete - make it use essentials #3944

PullRequests

Created

  • Make sure to use the correct p/invoke for 32-bit #4600
  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
  • Essentials.AppActions interface refactoring #4596
  • [ci] Allow to build agains internal sdks #4591
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4588
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y
  • [Android] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4587
    platform/android 🤖, area/a11y
  • Refactored Preferences into an Interface #4582

Merged

  • [ci] Agent-Cleanser: Ensure .NET cleansing is turned on #4595
  • Remove all GetAssemblies() implementations #4583
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactored SMS into an Interface #4584
  • iOS TabbedPage and NavigationPage measuring fixes #4576
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4551
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow to create custom layouts using Layout<View> #4558
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Refactored Map to an interface #4557
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Make Device.Idiom and Device.RuntimePlatform use Essentials #4548
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-preview.14

Updated

  • [ci] Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) support #4547
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
  • Moved IPlatformServices.GetNamedSize into a separate service #4570
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement image caching functionality for iOS #4515
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [ci] .NET step changes to overcome Mac build machine failures #4575
    do-not-merge
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
  • [Windows] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4562
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Implement InputTransparent property #4513
    area/controls 🎮
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect SQL generation: Navis not translated after the query is pushed down to subquery #27419
  • Exception creating migration to Drop a table #27418
  • Enum values fail to convert because EF has mapped them to the wrong enum when using .HasConversion<string> #27417
  • Replace our null checks with C# 11 !! #27416
  • Sorting of navigation properties - InMemoryDatabase #27415
  • ASP.Net core x86 application #27414
  • Support for "Named Arguments" #27413
  • Required reference with a nullable FK doesn't throw errors in sqlite and returns null for containing objects in queries #27411

Closed

  • Is there a way to mapping an entity derived from existing class? #27412

PullRequests

Created

  • Making tests slower #27410
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27409
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27406
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
